$$ 
R\emptyset = \frac { \beta S^* \sigma }{ \mu } \\

\beta = transmission\ rate \\

S^*= equilibrium\ susceptible\ host\ density \\

\sigma = spore\ yield \\

\mu = degradation\ rate \\ 
$$
